posts.post_content:
Even back in the day this was a junk rare. I mean, it's just f^cking [juggernaut](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=juggernaut), except until you hit threshold it's merely a 2/3 for 4. Oh, and juggernaut was uncommon.  
  
I would have been so \*\*\*ed if I got this card as my rare in a booster pack.
